lines.name: Hunt Valley â€“ Cromwell/Glen Burnie
lines.description: The main north-south line running from Hunt Valley in northern Baltimore County through downtown Baltimore on Howard Street to Cromwell Station/Glen Burnie in Anne Arundel County. The line follows the former Northern Central Railway right-of-way north of downtown and the former Baltimore and Annapolis Railroad alignment to the south.

lines.name: BWI Airport Branch
lines.description: A 2.7-mile branch diverging from the main line near Linthicum, serving the BWI Business District and BWI Thurgood Marshall Airport terminal. Partially single-tracked.

lines.name: Penn-Camden Shuttle
lines.description: A shuttle service running between Penn Station and Camden Yards via the downtown Howard Street corridor. Penn Station is connected via a 0.3-mile single-track spur from the main line near University of Baltimore/Mt Royal. Operates every 30 minutes with single-car trains.
